title: peTrEn veTri
sahitya:
peTrEn veTri vElan pEraruL pETrinai muTrum avanai nambi mOsamurAmalE nAn


anupallavi

  peTrOraip-pOlavE vaTrap-parivu kATTi pErinbattai UTTak-kOri-karam kUTTi


caraNam    vEda mantra sArattai Odiya ariyavillai nAda brahmOpAsanai Edum puriyavillai
sAdhu sanga bOdhanai kAdinil Eravillai vEdanaiyuTra bOdhavan pAdam paTrip-pOTri
